catalogEntries.title: Birthday Llama
catalogEntries.description: A blast from the past! Guarantees a weapon schematic and hero introduced during Fortnite events. One Epic or better, and one Legendary!

catalogEntries.devName: Mini Llama Manual Default - Low SharedDisplayPriority
catalogEntries.title: Mini Reward Llama
catalogEntries.description: A simple llama stuffed with basic goods to get you through your first apocalypse. Contains at least 3 items.

catalogEntries.title: Lunar Llama
catalogEntries.description: Guarantees at least one Epic or better limited time Dragon weapon or Lunar hero!

catalogEntries.title: Rare Firecracker Pistol
catalogEntries.description: One random Firecracker schematic.

catalogEntries.title: Legendary Troll Stash Llama
catalogEntries.description: An entire suite of goodies, direct from your local troll's stash! Contains at least 8 definitely-not-stolen items.

catalogEntries.title: 2021 Birthday Llama
catalogEntries.description: A blast from the past! Guarantees a weapon schematic and hero introduced during Fortnite events. One Epic or better, and one Legendary!

catalogEntries.title: Founder's Llama
catalogEntries.description: A special event pack! Guarantees one Founder's Epic weapon with a powerful level 5 perk.

catalogEntries.title: Music Gift Token
catalogEntries.description: Music Pass Gift Token

catalogEntries.title: LEGO Gift Token
catalogEntries.description: LEGO Pass Gift Token

catalogEntries.title: BP Gift Token
catalogEntries.description:
Give a friend the Chapter 6 Season 2 Battle Pass! Your purchase includes:

- A token allowing gifting of the Chapter 6 Season 2 Battle Pass to a friend of your choice.
- A unique Gift Box for you to use when gifting items from the Battle Royale shop (unlocks only once).

Note: In order to gift, you must have multi-factor authentication enabled on your account. You must also be Epic friends with the recipient for at least 48 hours before you can send them a gift.

You will only be able to gift five times within a 24 hour period. Any gifts that are purchased or received are NOT refundable. You can only gift one Battle Pass at a time.

If your intended recipient purchases the Battle Pass or subscribes to the Fortnite Crew before you complete your purchase, you can gift the Battle Pass to someone else. If you don’t gift the Battle Pass by the end of the season, it will be refunded as 1,000 V-Bucks in your account.

catalogEntries.title: BP Gift Token
catalogEntries.description:
Give a friend the Chapter 2, Season 5 Battle Pass! Your purchase includes:

- A token allowing gifting of the Chapter 2, Season 5 Battle Pass to a friend of your choice.
- A unique Gift Box for you to use when gifting items from the Battle Royale shop (unlocks only once).

Note: In order to gift, you must have multi-factor authentication enabled on your account. You must also be Epic friends with the recipient for at least 48 hours before you can send them a gift.

You will only be able to gift five times within a 24 hour period. Any gifts that are purchased or received are NOT refundable. You can only gift one Battle Pass at a time.

If your intended recipient purchases the Battle Pass before you complete your purchase, you can gift the Battle Pass to someone else. If you don’t gift the Battle Pass by the end of the season, it will be refunded as 950 V-Bucks in your account.

catalogEntries.title: The Lars Pack
catalogEntries.description: Peace, love, and Steel Wool. Shred in style with the Lars Pack.

catalogEntries.title: Rogue Scout Pack
catalogEntries.description: Stay focused and get the job done. Always come out on top with the Rogue Scout Pack. Includes access to \"Save the World\" PvE Campaign.

catalogEntries.title: Ghoul Punk Pack
catalogEntries.description: Zombies, ghouls and punk rockers. Calling everyone to the stage with the Ghoul Punk Pack. Includes access to \"Save the World\" PvE Campaign.

catalogEntries.title: Ned the Eternal Pack
catalogEntries.description: He really can't leave without, so he'll have to find it himself. Time to locate what you lost with the Ned the Eternal Pack. Includes access to \"Save the World\" PvE Campaign.

catalogEntries.title: Natural Constructor Pack
catalogEntries.description: Exploration is a hobby but construction is life. Build your victory on the fly with the Natural Constructor Pack. Includes access to \"Save the World\" PvE Campaign.

catalogEntries.title: Scrap & Burn Pack
catalogEntries.description: Construct and reconstruct till you get what you want. Nothing gets wasted in the wasteland with the Scrap & Burn Pack. Includes access to \"Save the World\" PvE Campaign.

catalogEntries.title: Vinderman 2.0 Pack
catalogEntries.description: This BluGlonium-fueled inventor has a passion for science. Fulfill your dashingly scientific process with the Vinderman 2.0 Pack. Includes access to \"Save the World\" PvE Campaign.

catalogEntries.title: Untask'd Courier Pack
catalogEntries.description: Task'd Corp didn't know what they had in Sid Obsidian. Time to find that new directive with the Untask'd Courier Pack. Includes access to \"Save the World\" PvE Campaign.

catalogEntries.title: Cuddle Buns Pack
catalogEntries.description: Pawline will always rise to the occasion. Have a \"bunderful' day with the Cuddle Buns Pack. Includes an Outfit (w/ LEGO® Style), Back Bling, Pickaxe and access to \"Save the World\" PvE Campaign.

catalogEntries.title: Full Clip Pack
catalogEntries.description: Homebase's surefire munitions maker finally gets to use her wares. Restock, reload and get ready with the Full Clip Pack. Includes access to \"Save the World\" PvE Campaign.

catalogEntries.title: Fully Realized Pack
catalogEntries.description: With her Teth-R 128 VR/AR System, Colby is always ready to play. Roll along with her using the Fully Realized Pack. Includes access to \"Save the World\" PvE Campaign.

catalogEntries.title: Save the World Quest Pack
catalogEntries.description: Gain access to \"Save the World\" PvE Campaign and Save the World Challenges that will allow you to earn up to 1,000 V-Bucks.
